body.p: Indian reporter get two letters today and one letter from Ben Cady who was boss at cranberry marsh Valley Corporation and tell about want to have paper go to Rockford where he now live and moved there. Everybody that work for Ben Cady think he is pretty good fellow and all Indian like to work for him and sorry when they hear he leave cranberry marsh. Other letter I got from Minneapolis fellow and his name Andrew Senerson and he want big picture of Indian reporter to have in frame and hang on wall and tell about have room in his house Minneapolis all about Indian and want picture of me to hang on wall. I have to write to him and tell Mr. Senerson I don’t have big picture like what he want and I send him little picture and maybe he can make it big picture like he want. Saturday first day to hunt deer and lot of Indian just same like me and don’t have any money to buy license and can’t hunt deer. Young Indian fellow tell me other day about he want to get license so he can shoot deer but don’t have money and take everything he make to buy things for family to eat and now can’t get job and nobody hire Indian to do work and pretty bad when good Indian young fellow can’t shoot deer to eat and all whole country was Indian S and all deer was Indian’s before white man come over here Europe and take all away from him and now when he don’t have white man money to buy license with tell him “you can’t kill deer or put you in jail.” Other day when Indian reporter over by rock cut between Tomah and Valley Junction on old railroad I see big track that look like cow track and I know deer track and two three days I go there and I see big buck but he wasn’t in same place but pretty sure same deer. .
